descriptionHtml:
[youtube]ghHtIbs75CE[/youtube]
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
Marble Phantasm Mod by elysees

7:19, 28 June 2014
*Fix : Windows Error Beep

-Powers
-Auto learn
-Requre : Magicka 100%

[b]>>Marble Phantasm[/b]
Damage : Alteration 10%
duration : 10 Second per 0.24 Skyrim Delay Time
range : 45Area

[b]Melty Blood[/b]
How to use : during Marble Phantasm > AttackSwing
Damage : oneHanded or twoHanded Higher Value 30% *6HIT
range : 45Area





[b]::Console Command::[/b]
` > Set MarbleDamageRate to 1.0
default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)

` > Set MarbleRequireMagicka to 1.0
default value 1.0 (1.0=100%)

` > Set MarbleDelay to 0.24 [b]<- Very Very important!!![/b]
default value 0.24
ex) Script Delay, Can't Damage Dealing : decrease
ex) Skill Delay, Can't Summon Chains : increase

` > Set MarbleChainNum to 60
default value 60 (60=Summon Chains 60EA)





[b]::CREDIT::[/b]
CTAddPose SPB 02 : A-Type2
Special Thanks : 눈알동동

*Feel free to use everything in this file.
